      • selectKDistinct

        public static int[] selectKDistinct(int n,
                                    int k,
                                    Random rand)
        Select k distinct integers from range [0, n) with reservoir sampling: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Reservoir_sampling.
        Parameters:
        n - Number specifying left end of range of integers to pick values from.
        k - Count specifying how many integers should be picked.
        rand - RNG.
        Returns:
        Array containing k distinct integers from range [0, n);

      • selectKDistinct

        public static int[] selectKDistinct(int n,
                                    int k)
        Select k distinct integers from range [0, n) with reservoir sampling: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Reservoir_sampling. Equivalent to selectKDistinct(n, k, new Random()).
        Parameters:
        n - Number specifying left end of range of integers to pick values from.
        k - Count specifying how many integers should be picked.
        Returns:
        Array containing k distinct integers from range [0, n);
